sourcesContent:
<template>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<script>

const debounce = (fn, delay) => {

let timer = null;

return function () {

  let context = this;

  let args = arguments;

  clearTimeout(timer);

  timer = setTimeout(function () {

    fn.apply(context, args);

  }, delay);

}

}

</script>

<style>

</style>
